name: Flight of the Honeybees
description:
Seventh game. Co-created with Marissa Sun for the Global Game Jam 2018 (Transmission). Music by Peter Nishimura.

Goal:

  • Reach the end of the field to pollinate the flowers
  • Avoid axolotls, leaves, badgers, and wasps
  • Swap between bees depending on the situation
  • Collide with other bees on the path to swap bees (If you have more than 3) or gain a new bee

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows keys to move
  • 1, 2, or 3 to switch bees
  • Space bar to shoot projectile for certain bees
